name: Elements (Jefftxp)
description:
ELEMENTS!

Gameplay of first 2 levels: 

Your goal is simple: survival.

Just kidding. This isn't a survival game. But, you do have 3 lives so maybe it is...

Either way, your job is to collect all the elements on each level.

Unfortunately, I ran out of time and you only get 4 levels to try out.

Assets: I'm not an artist so I used the mannequin, pre-made materials, music from the asset store, sounds from Soundly. I made the Powerup meshes, the element mesh, the rocks, the platforms. I spent a few hours in the particle editor modifying the ones available from Infinity Warblade pack.

My goal with this project was to script as much Blueprint stuff as I could. The UI, the characters, powerups, etc.

This is my first ever game jam, so let me know what you think. All feedback is appreciated!
